command_only_group: You can use this command only in a Telegram group!
goodquestion_not_autovote: ‚õîÔ∏è Sorry man, you can't vote for yourself!
haers_not_you_master: üìµ You're not the master at the moment, if it's a mistake you can use: /master @TUO_NICKNAME
hears_missing_question:
ü§¨ Hey buddy! What are you writing? First of all, the WORD(S) to guess, then a MINUS sign, finally the HINT. If you want to send also a picture, please insert it the caption. All in a single message. Exemple:

Ant - very small animal

Ant is the word to guess, then there is the MINUS sign and finally the HINT (very small animal). Don't be ashamed, try again!
hears_missing_tip:
ü§¨ Hey buddy! You forgot the MINUS sign. First of all, the WORD(S) to guess, then a MINUS sign, finally the HINT. If you want to send also a picture, please insert it the caption. All in a single message. Exemple:

Ant - very small animal

Ant is the word to guess, then there is the MINUS sign and finally the HINT (very small animal). Don't be ashamed, try again!
hears_missing_caption:
ü§¨ Hey buddy! You forgot the caption. First of all, the WORD(S) to guess, then a MINUS sign, finally the HINT. If you want to send also a picture, please insert it the caption. All in a single message. Exemple:

Ant - very small animal

Ant is the word to guess, then there is the MINUS sign and finally the HINT (very small animal). Don't be ashamed, try again!
hears_missing_photo_caption:
ü§¨ Hey buddy! You forgot the caption when you inserted the picture. Write down the WORD(S) to guess as caption, then a MINUS sign and finally the HINT. All in a single message. Exemple:

Ant - very small animal

Ant is the word to guess, then there is the MINUS sign and finally the HINT (very small animal). Don't be ashamed, try again!
hears_win: üèÜ GREAT JOB ##first_name## (@##username##) YOU WIN!!! ‚úçÔ∏è The correct answer was: ##answer## üëë Now you are the new master! ‚öΩÔ∏è Your score is ##score## üî• To take a quiz, write a private message to @##bot_username## (click on the nickname) and follow the instruction.
hears_win_but_not_master: üèÜ YOU WIN ##first_name##!! But you can't be master because you don't have a Telegram username. Please set a username: go to Telegram settings, click on edit and write your @nickname! ##master_first_name## (@##master_username##) is still the master.
master_command_success:
Now you are the master @##username##! To take a quiz, write a private message to @##bot_username## (click on the nickname) and write there the word or the sentence to guess, followed by a MINUS SIGN and the hint, for exemple: 

anteater - cute animal with a very long nose
score_command_show: ##first_name## (@##username##) your score in this group is ##score##!
start_command_group: Before starting to play set this bot as an admin of this group. Then make yourself the master by running the command: /master ##username##
start_command_private:
Write down the world or the sentence to guess followed by a minus sign and the hint. You can also send a picture and use the same scheme in the caption. All in a single message, for exemple: 

anteater - cute animal with a very long nose

anteater is the word to guess, then there is the MINUS sign and finally the HINT (cute animal with a very long nose).
top10_command_not_available: Leaderboard not available for this group!
hot_answer: üî• ##first_name## (@##username##) - PRETTY CLOSE! You quite guess the answer!
admin_welcome: Welcome to the admin board. Choose the option:
action_send_messagge_all_groups: Send a message to all groups
admin_set_user_score_info_request:
Insert the username, the score and the id of the user in a single message separated by a minus sign, for exemple:

ptkdev - 100 - 5032010
